slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.graph_builder_ABC module

class slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.graph_builder_ABC.GraphBuilder(config: GraphBuilderConfig)[source]

Bases: ABC

Base abstract graph builder.

Creates a sub-graph from the measurements and merges it with the main graph.

abstract __init__(config: GraphBuilderConfig) → None[source]
Parameters:

config – a configuration for the graph builder.

abstract property graph_candidate: GraphCandidate

Graph candidate.

abstract create_graph_candidate(batch: DataBatch) → None[source]

Creates graph candidate. Uses the measurements from the data batch.

Parameters:

batch – a data batch with measurements.

abstract merge_graph_candidate(graph: Graph) → None[source]

Merges the graph candidate with the given graph.

Parameters:

graph – a graph to be merged with.

abstract clear_candidate() → None[source]

Clears the graph candidate.

Bases: object

static create(name: str) → type[GraphBuilder][source]

Matches the given name with the graph builder type and returns the type of graph builder.

Parameters:

name – name of the graph builder to create.

Returns:

type of graph builder.

Merges the state with the graph.

  • graph – a graph to merge the state with.
